name: Ammo Delivery
description:
We are Under War !!! Help The army By delivering Ammu-nation....

Use Key A and Key D to control the Truck to receive the Packages dropped by Helicopters.

Use the SpaceBar to Open the parachutes while the packages are in air...

Use the left mouse Button to Drag and create the wind in direction of Drag near packages...(You have to drag near the packages for wind)..
